pullrequest.title: Added transparency based on diffuse color's alpha channel in OGRE2

content.raw:
> Also without this PR there is no way to make transparent primitives purely in SDF, this can now be done.

This reminded me the todo item in ign-gazebo. I created a [pull request in ign-gazebo](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/547) to support specifying a visual’s transparency through the `<transparency>` sdf element
content.html:
Also without this PR there is no way to make transparent primitives purely in SDF, this can now be done.

This reminded me the todo item in ign-gazebo. I created a pull request in ign-gazebo to support specifying a visual’s transparency through the <transparency> sdf element
